text: Pas, [ej pajomʙar] tu niz hamcun pajomʙaroni ululazm [ki hamvora soʙitqadam ʙudand, dar ʙaroʙari ozoru takziʙi qavmat] sikeʙo ʙos va dar mavridi [darxosti azoʙi] onon sitoʙ nakun. Ruze, ki [in kofiron] azoʙi mav'udasonro [dar cahoni oxirat] ʙuʙinand, [kajfarason cunon tuloni ast, ki] gui faqat ʙaxse az ruzro [dar dunjo] ʙa sar ʙurdaand. In Qur'on pajomi [umumi ʙaroi cinnu ins] ast. Ojo cuz nofarmonon halok mesavand
